name: Create an Instagram for Business photo post from a new row in a Microsoft 365 Excel worksheet
description:
Every time a new row is added to your Microsoft 365 Excel worksheet, Make will create a new Instagram for Business photo post.

Your Microsoft 365 Excel worksheet has to contain headers. The template uses [this worksheet](https://1drv.ms/x/s!AjJKBs6vWrtygRePQlO1D1P5T4Lh?e=sDLAH5).
